description.value:
Trigger The encounter begins

Effect The necroblast begins its detonation countdown, and the doomed shuttle rolls initiative.

stealth.details: (trained) to notice necromantic energy emanating from the cockpit (allowing the use of Arcana to Disable).

details.description: The planetary shuttle has already taken severe damage to its engines and hull, sending it on a crash course toward the planet. Meanwhile, a necromantic spell planted in the ship's computer will imminently unleash an explosion of void energy.
details.disable: @Check[piloting|dc:16] (trained) to take control and force the shuttle to a lower altitude, @Check[arcana|dc:18] (trained) or @Check[thievery|dc:18] (trained) to counter the necroblast long enough to prevent its detonation, @Check[perception|dc:20] to look for the closest landing zone, @Check[crafting|dc:20] (trained) to take apart the console and defuse the bomb, @Check[religion|dc:23] to pray for divine intercession; four total successes are required to defeat the hazard (see Development). A creature that succeeds at any of these checks gains a +1 circumstance bonus on their save against the hazard's damage for 1 round.

publication.title: Starfinder Guilt of the Grave World

details.reset: The bomb goes off after 4 rounds. See Development.
details.routine: (3 actions) Void energy leaks out from the console as the necroblast prepares to detonate. All creatures on the ship take @Damage[(2d6+4)[void]] damage (@Check[will|dc:18|basic] save).
